DKeep.logic

Class Guard

  • java.lang.Object
    • DKeep.logic.Character
      • DKeep.logic.Guard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Drunken, Rookie, Suspicious

    public class Guard
extends Character
    Class Guard - Character -> Guard Type of Character. SuperClass of each type of guards (Suspicious, Drunken and Rookie).
    Since:
    2018-03-31
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    André Esteves && Luís Diogo Silva

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(char[][] map)
        Moves the Guard in the respective given map. Respecting some conditions (his path).
        Parameters:
        map - char[][] map to be set with Guard's movement.

      • movePart2

        public void movePart2(char[][] map)

      • positionChange

        public int positionChange(int indice,
                          char[] path,
                          boolean direction)
        Auxiliary function to some Guards' movement Respecting some conditions (his path).
        Parameters:
        int - index current position in path
        map - char[][] path Guard's movement path.
        boolean - direction current Guard's direction in path

      • positionChangeSwitch

        public void positionChangeSwitch(int indice,
                                 char[] path,
                                 int num)
        Auxiliary function to positionChange function Respecting some conditions (his path).
        Parameters:
        int - index current position in path
        map - char[][] path Guard's movement path.
        num - direction number, can be 1 or -1.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame(java.io.BufferedWriter writer)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the information of the Guard.
        Parameters:
        writer - BufferedWriter writer to be set with the respective info. xPos and yPos.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws exception if fails on writing.
